General.Name: Savara Inc
General.Description: Savara Inc., a clinical stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on rare respiratory diseases. The company's lead product candidate is molgramostim, an inhaled granulocyte-macrophage colony-stimulating factor, which is in Phase 3 development stage for the treatment of autoimmune pulmonary alveolar proteinosis. Savara Inc. is headquartered in Austin, Texas.
General.Address: Building III, Austin, TX, United States, 78746
